global.home site title: NewSwap - Decentralized Exchange Protocol on NewChain
global.invest warning: Contents on this website is not intended as investment advice. Please make your own prudent decisions and independently assume the corresponding risks before trading or investing.

slogan.home s1 2: Running on the secure and reliable NewChain, NewSwap offers the high performance and low cost trades of multiple inter-blockchain assets and newton ecosystem tokens with automated market makers and a dual-token liquidity mining mechanism design. All transaction fees are provided to liquidity providers and governed by the community.
slogan.home s1 3: Everyone is able to issue and trade digital assets

features.text1: Running on NewChain, users own their assets
features.text2: Fast Transaction Speed and Low Transaction Fee
features.text4: System Determines Price with Automated Market Makers(AMM)
features.text5: Multiple Inter-Blockchain Assets and Newton Ecosystem Tokens Support
features.text6: A Dual-Token Liquidity Mining Mechanism Design

newton.base: Newton: Infrastructure for the Community Economy
newton.slogan: Everyone Should Benefit from Economic Growth

business.title: Economic Model
business.text1: The token price in NewSwap is set by system and a transaction fee of 0.3% will be charged for all trades occurring in NewSwap. All fees are provided to liquidity providers of the pool.
business.text2: When liquidity mining is launched, the transaction fee of 0.25% will be rewarded directly to liquidity providers. The transaction fee of 0.05% will go into Liquidity Reward Pool to support the value of NewSwap Token (NST).
business.text3: Adding liquidity on specified pools to mine NST by staking LP tokens and NewSwap Power(NSP). Also, staking NSP into governance contracts could mine NST.
business.note: Before mining launches, the transaction fee of 0.3% will be rewarded directly to liquidity providers.

tokens.Cross-chain assets description: Following Cross-Chain Assets are verified on NewChain Mainnet by Newton Project. When using assets on NewChain please check it is the correct one with the right contract address. To learn more about Cross-Chain Assets or transfer assets between different blockchains, please visit
